```{r}
require(rpart)
require(rpart.plot)
dt<-rpart(Pedagogie~., data=don.groupe)
prp(dt, extra = 1+100,type = 2, under=TRUE, yesno=2)
plotcp(dt)
```





```{r}
dt<-rpart(Pedagogie~audela, data=don.groupe)

plotcp(dt)
```
